Task: Identify if the comment contains targeted name-calling.
Instructions:
Name-calling involves insulting or demeaning nouns directed at a person or group, such as “weirdo,” “fool,” “moron,” or derogatory nicknames (e.g., calling Hillary Clinton 'Hellary'). Code Yes (1) if:
The comment uses a noun as an insult or slur directed at someone.
Words like 'traitor', 'racist', 'pedophile', or 'Nazis' appear, but only if they are clearly intended as insults rather than descriptive of behavior or policy.
Examples of name-calling (Yes (1)):
'Donald Trump is an old fool. Only a fool would follow another fool.'
